title: Designing Assessments for Understanding Medieval History Using Multimodal Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of Western history and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners are preparing for roles requiring simultaneous historical content analysis and digital media production capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and represent medieval Europe’s economic, social, and political changes using at least three visual materials (e.g., infographics, timelines).
Learners can reconstruct the causal relationships of historical events using multimodal texts and digital storytelling techniques.
Learners can revise and refine their historical interpretations at least twice through feedback-based formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
